page.title: 07SPORTS FACILITIES.
page.content: THE MAIN SPORTS FACILITIES ARE TO BE FOUND AT{CLEMENTS HALL.}THIS SPORTS CENTRE HAS PROVISION FOR SWIMMING, BADMINTON, TRAMPOLINING, SQUASH, WEIGHT TRAINING, GYMNASTICS, TABLE TENNIS, BASKETBALL, VOLLEYBALL, FOOTBALL, KEEPFIT, ROCKCLIMBING, SOLARIUM AND A BAR. THE THREE MOST POPULAR USES OF THE CENTRE ARE SWIMMING, BADMINTON AND SQUASH. FROM THE SURVEY UNDERTAKEN IT WAS FOUND THAT 86% OF THE MEMBERS LIVE WITHIN 5 MILES. THIS PATTERN IS TO BE EXPECTED DUE TO COMPETITION FROM OTHER SIMILAR FACILITIES, AND THE DESIRE OF PEOPLE TO KEEP THE COST OF TRAVEL TO A MINIMUM. THE SURVEY SHOWED THAT 34% OF THE PEOPLE WENT TO THE CENTRE ONCE A WEEK WHILE 16% WENT 3 OR 4 TIMES A WEEK.
